value.title: Ethical AI and the importance of guidelines for algorithms — explained
value.excerpt: Amazon had to discontinue an artificial intelligence–powered recruiting tool after it discovered the system was biased against female applicants. In 2016, a ProPublica investigation revealed a recidivism assessment tool that used machine learning was biased against black defendants.

images.title: Ethical AI and the importance of guidelines for algorithms — explained

value.title: It’s The Data, Stupid! Why AI Might Get It Wrong.
